General.Name: Guangdong Jingyi Metal Co Ltd
General.Description: Guangdong JingYi Metal CO.,Ltd engages in copper processing business in China. The company offers thread copper tubes, micro heat pipes, copper tube cables for communication, copper magnetron for microwaves, and precision copper pipe parts for gas and refrigeration, as well as copper rods and other products. It also provides supply chain trading platform. The company serves to air-conditioning, refrigeration, communications, and other industries. Guangdong JingYi Metal CO.,Ltd was founded in 1999 and is headquartered in Foshan, China.
